root.BusinessItemHeadingNumbered: Shared Parental Leave and Pay (Bereavement) Bill: Second Reading

from_cdata.p: If proceedings on this Bill end before 2.30pm, the second Bill and, possibly, subsequent Bills may be debated in the time remaining. After 2.30pm, only Bills which are unopposed may make further progress.

p.span: A money resolution is required for this Bill to be proceeded with in Committee.
